name: INUpcomingMediaManager
desc: The manager object you use to suggest media to the user.

items.name: func setSuggestedMediaIntents(NSOrderedSet)
items.desc: Provides Siri with a list of media intents to suggest to the user.

items.name: func setPredictionMode(INUpcomingMediaPredictionMode, for: INMediaItemType)
items.desc: Suggests how Siri should predict media intent shortcuts.

items.name: enum INUpcomingMediaPredictionMode
items.desc: Prediction modes for upcoming media intent shortcuts.
